content: HELLO I REPRESENT A LUXURY HOME WARRANTY SERVICE WOULD YOU LIKE TO PARTNER WITH US REPLY YES TO GET MORE INFORMATION

Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. This line is reserved for customers seeking plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services. If you are interested in our services, please let us know how we can assist you.
WE WILL PAY YOU FOR EVERY LEAD YOU SEND US GREAT OPPORTUNITY REPLY YES

We are unable to engage in promotional or partnership offers over this channel. If you have a service request for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC work, please let us know. Otherwise, further promotional messages may be marked as spam.
ACT NOW WE ALSO WORK WITH SOLAR COMPANIES REPLY YES OR STOP TO OPT OUT
This conversation has been flagged as spam and will be closed. If you require genuine service, please contact us through our official website or phone number. Thank you.
